beneficialOwners.title: Beneficial owners
beneficialOwners.description: The beneficial owners of the organization.

listedOnRegulatedMarket.title: Listed on regulated market
listedOnRegulatedMarket.description: Whether the organization is listed on a regulated market (e.g. a stock exchange) that ensures adequate transparency of the nationality of beneficial owners.

id.title: ID
id.description: A local identifier for the person.

name.title: Name
name.description: The full name of the person.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: An official identifier for the person. The scheme should follow the pattern {JURISDICTION}-{TYPE}, where JURISDICTION is a three-letter, uppercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code, and TYPE is one of "PASSPORT", "TAXID" or "IDCARD".

nationality.title: Nationality
nationality.description: The nationality of the person, as a two-letter, uppercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

email.title: Email
email.description: The e-mail address of the person.

faxNumber.title: Fax number
faxNumber.description: The fax number of the person. This should include the international dialing code.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.description: The telephone number of the person. This should include the international dialing code.
